name: The Dynastic Cycle
description:
Play as a young shrine maiden living through various ancient Chinese dynasties, collecting sacred sun stones to offer up to the gods in hope of saving the dynasty.

Five levels based on the Shang, Zhou, Song, Ming and Qing Dynasties of China.

Player character moves on an auto-pilot towards the sun stones, so all you have to do is press space to jump and avoid obstacles!

See the game on artstation: http://isochi.artstation.com/pages/the-dynastic-cycle
